dataList.content: <color=#ffffb7>A very so merry night we hold dear</color>
<color=#ffffb7>So many, so many regrets bring me to tears</color>
<color=#ffffb7>Not many, not many notice nor care</color>
<color=#ffffb7>Why does a common fire hold so much power?</color>
<color=#ffffb7>If only we could be forever naive and pure</color>
<color=#ffffb7>If only we could lead painless futures</color>
<color=#ffffb7>If only there could be a forgiving world</color>
